Author: mrSprinkles
Title: [ICO] [BMC-BMCOIN]: Bank of memories - save your identity through time
Body: Pre ICO – Ongoing Github source: https://github.com/bankofmemories/bankofmemories   You can buy tokens NOW by unique price: https://bmcoin.io/en/  Pre-ICO: 14.10.2017 - 28.10.2017  ICO course: 20.11.2017 - 3.01.2018 (4 Stages)  Support: info@bmcoin.io TelegramBot  +380991484779 — Hotline (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram)  Mon-Fri 10:00 a.m. — 7:00 p.m. Msk  Bank of Memories is a platform that allows you to store and encrypt information in the blockchain and make it inheritable (accessible only to specific recipients). For this, an application is written that combines the functions of secure storage and data transmission and the function of delayed transmission of emotions. You may send message to the future.    Maximum amount of tokens 1 000 000 000 tokens. 50% - 500 000 000 maximum of tokens are issued to realize initial ICO goals; 48% - 480 000 000 maximum of tokens for founders and developers fund and new users; 2%  - 20 000 000 maximum of tokens for partners program, Bounty program and system development;  Pre-ICO: 14.10.2017 - 28.10.2017  ICO course: 20.11.2017 - 3.01.2018 (4 Stages)  Accepted currencies: ETH, BTC  BMCoin ICO platform: Ethereum smart-contract (ERC20)  Buy tokens: https://bmcoin.io/en/  Contacts: info@bmcoin.io +380991484779 - Hotline (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram) https://bmcoin.io/ - Online chat  We will be pleased to answer all your questions!  News: https://bmcoin.io/news/en/bank-of-memories-presented-a-project-for-ico-revizor/ https://bmcoin.io/news/en/ukrainian-blockchain-startup-bank-of-memories-held-a-successful-pre-sale-ico/  Our resources: https://bmcoin.io/en/ https://bmcoin.io/news/ https://t.me/BMCOIN https://www.facebook.com/Bank-of-memories-1967517866854321/?ref=br_rs  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaIkgxyTlPE83LOYH5GIqLg https://twitter.com/bankof_memories https://www.instagram.com/bankofmemoriesltd
